values.description: Salesforce instance base URL (e.g. https://MyDomain.my.salesforce.com). Override with --env-var in CI.
Salesforce OAuth authorization URL. Use https://test.salesforce.com for sandboxes.
User API Service version (e.g. v1, v2). Distinct from the Salesforce REST API version.
OAuth 2.0 Bearer access token. Set dynamically by the 'POST Obtain Access Token' request or via --env-var in CI.
Connected App Client ID (Consumer Key). Set this for the client_credentials OAuth flow.
Connected App Client Secret (Consumer Secret). Never commit real values. Use CI secrets or a secrets manager.
Dynamically generated test username. Set by the pre-request script of POST Create User.
Dynamically generated test email. Set by the pre-request script of POST Create User.
First name used for test user creation.
Dynamically generated test last name. Set by the pre-request script of POST Create User.
ID of the user created during the test run. Populated by POST Create User and used by GET/PUT/DELETE requests.
First name value used in PUT Update User request.
Last name value used in PUT Update User request.
Development environment base URL. Enable and set base_url accordingly when targeting dev.
Staging environment base URL. Enable and set base_url accordingly when targeting staging.
Production environment base URL. Enable and set base_url accordingly when targeting prod.
